com.topcoder.search.builder.filter
Class AbstractSimpleFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.AbstractSimpleFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Filter, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BetweenFilter, EqualToFilter, GreaterThanFilter, GreaterThanOrEqualToFilter, LessThanFilter, LessThanOrEqualToFilter, NullFilter
public abstract class AbstractSimpleFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

This abstract class is a concrete implementor of the Filter interface. It is used to construct simple Filter. However, the getFilterType() method and isValid() methods are abstract, which are intended to be implemented by subclasses differently. This abstract class provides some common functions shared among concrete simple filter classes.

Version:
1.3
Author:
ShindouHikaru, TCSDEVELOPER
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

fieldName

protected java.lang.String fieldName
It will hold the filed name of the search criterion. Both can be the real name and alias name.

value

protected java.lang.Comparable value
It will hold a Comparable object. For example, if a LessThan filter is built by the constrcutor, then this attribute is initialized by the Comparable object in the constructor. It is used to set upperThreashold and lowerThreashold attributes

upperThreshold

protected java.lang.Comparable upperThreshold
It will hold a Comparable object representing the upper threshold of this filter.

lowerThreshold

protected java.lang.Comparable lowerThreshold
It will hold a Comparable object representing the lower threshold of this filter.

isUpperThresholdInclusive

protected boolean isUpperThresholdInclusive
It will hold a boolean indicating if the upper threshold is inclusive.

isLowerThresholdInclusive

protected boolean isLowerThresholdInclusive
It will hold a boolean indicating if the lower threshold is inclusive. It is inclusive if true, exclusive otherwise

Constructor Detail

AbstractSimpleFilter

protected AbstractSimpleFilter(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.Comparable value)

Create a new instance,by providing the name and value.

Parameters:
name - the filed name of the search criterion
value - a Comparable object used to set the upperThreshold and lowerThreshold attributes
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is Null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name parameter is empty

AbstractSimpleFilter

public AbstractSimpleFilter(java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.Comparable upper,
                            java.lang.Comparable lower)

Create a new instance,by providing the name ,upperThreshold and isUpperThresholdInclusive. The constructor if for the betweenFilter.

Parameters:
name - the field name of the simple filter.
upper - the upperThreshold of the simple filter.
lower - the lowerThreshold of the simple filter.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the any param is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the name is empty.
